title: 30-minute walk
description: A brisk neighborhood leash walk suitable for most adult dogs.

title: 60-minute hike
description: Trail hike with varied terrain and more exercise for energetic dogs.

title: Off-leash play
description: Supervised off-leash play in secure, fenced areas or controlled trails.

title: Puppy socialization
description: Gentle supervised play to build social skills for puppies under 6 months.

title: Senior stroll
description: Calm, restorative walks tailored for older dogs with low energy needs.

title: Double walk (2 dogs)
description: Leash walks for two dogs from the same household (discounted add-on).

title: Weekend hike
description: Long weekend hikes for highly active dogs who need extra exercise.

title: Fetch & play session
description: Special session focused on fetch, recall, and play in a safe area.

title: Behavior walk
description: Walks with focused reinforcement for leash manners and basic commands.

title: Holiday visit
description: Short check-in visits for feeding or potty breaks on holidays.

title: Extended play
description: Large-group play events and long off-leash park sessions.

title: Intro meet & greet
description: Quick meet to introduce handler and go over notes before first booking.

title: Medication administration
description: Administer medications per owner instructions during a visit.

title: Puppy training add-on
description: Focused short training sessions for puppies to reinforce good habits.

title: Evening dropoff/pickup
description: Evening window for pickup and dropoff, convenient for busy owners.
